value: Se reînnoiește pentru un alt termen
description:
• Contract term completes and a new contract term is started for the number of billing cycles specified in contract_billing_cycle_on_renewal.
  • The action_at_term_end for the new contract term is set to renew.
Can be set when you are recording your customer Chargebacks
Contract term completes and subscription is canceled.

value: Am întâmpinat o problemă la accesarea contului dvs. paypal.
reference value: We've encountered a problem while accessing your paypal account.
description: We've encountered a problem while accessing your paypal account.
Indicates the payment is not yet collected and will be in this state till the due date to indicate the due period
Payments made via PayPal Express Checkout.

• Product Catalog 2.0: The invoice is yet to be closed (sent for payment collection). An invoice is generated with this status when it has line items that belong to items that are metered or when the subscription.create_pending_invoices attribute is set to true.
  • Product Catalog 1.0: The invoice is yet to be closed (sent for payment collection). All invoices are generated with this status when Metered Billing is enabled for the site.

value: Am întâmpinat o problemă în timpul utilizării contului dvs. Amazon. Vă rugăm să selectați o altă metodă de plată.
reference value: Encountered a problem while using your amazon account. Please select a different payment method.
description: Encountered a problem while using your amazon account. Please select a different payment method.
Card based payment including credit cards and debit cards. Details about the card can be obtained from the card resource.

value: Sesiunea dvs. PayPal a expirat. Vă rugăm să încercați din nou.
reference value: Your PayPal session has expired. Please try again.
description: Your PayPal session has expired. Please try again.
The subscription will be canceled at the end of the current term.

value: Metoda de plată selectată în Amazon a fost refuzată. Actualizați-l și încercați din nou.
reference value: Your selected payment method in amazon was declined. Please update it and try again.
description: Your selected payment method in amazon was declined. Please update it and try again.

value: Contractul se încheie, abonamentul continuă să se reînnoiască
reference value: Contract ends, subscription continues to renew
description: Contract term completes and the subscription renews.
Card belonging to types other than those listed above.
This reason will be set automatically for the Credit Notes created during invoice Write Off operation.
The per unit price is based on the tier that the total quantity falls in.
Used for offline entries in transactions. Not applicable for cards
When the Credit Note has been cancelled.
The subscription is active and will be charged for automatically based on the items in it.

reference value: Cancels at end of next contract term
description:
Used when you want to renew the contract term just once. Does the following:
  • Contract term completes and a new contract term is started for the number of billing cycles specified in contract_billing_cycle_on_renewal.
  • The action_at_term_end for the new contract term is set to cancel.
When the credits are yet to be used, or have been partially used.
Bank Account Type is not set at the gateway
Payment Methods other than the above types
Represents bank account for which the direct debit or ACH agreement/mandate is created.

value: Sistemul de plăți nu a răspuns la timp. Vă rugăm să încercați după ceva timp.
reference value: The payment system did not respond in time. Please try after some time.
description: The payment system did not respond in time. Please try after some time.
The billing agreement cannot be used. It might become valid again either automatically or due to  customer action.
The subscription has been canceled and is no longer in service.
This reason will be set automatically for Credit Notes created during Change Subscription operation when proration is enabled
Indicates the payment is not yet collected and is being retried as per retry settings.

value: Imposibil de utilizat contul dvs. Amazon. Vă rugăm să selectați o altă metodă de plată.
reference value: Unable to use your amazon account. Please select a different payment method.
description: Unable to use your amazon account. Please select a different payment method.

A card which is expiring in the current month.
When the entire credits (Credit Note amount) have been used (i.e either allocated to invoices or refunded).

value: Problemă la procesarea metodei de plată. Vă rugăm să verificați detaliile metodei de plată.

Only applicable for a transaction of type = refund. This value is set by Chargebee when an automated chargeback occurs. You can also set this explicitly when recording a refund.
